chapter.title: Acknowledgements
chapter.para: We would like to thank the following organizations and corporations for supporting and sponsoring the development of eXist:

tr.td: The new indexing engine featured in eXist, for Versions 1.1 and all subsequent releases, is made possible through the agency of the University of Victoria node of the Canadian TAPoR consortium, who have made it available for general use.

td.style: font-size: 4em; font-family: Garamond, Helvetica, 'Arial Black', serif; color: #660000; font-weight: bold;

tr.td: Trapeze Networks, headquartered in Pleasanton, Calif., has continuously sponsored improvements and new features since 2004 and helped to advance development by testing and deploying eXist in a production environment.

Major parts of the XQuery implementation were motivated and sponsored by the project: "Exemplarische Internet-Edition der Werke des jungen Goethe und Jakob Michael Reinhold Lenz'", funded by the Fritz-Thyssen Stiftung.
